channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 College of Computer Science and Technology, Tongji University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Reconstructing the Image Stitching Pipeline: Integrating Fusion and Rectangling into a Unified Inpainting Model
item.description: SRStitcher revolutionizes image stitching by integrating fusion and rectangling into a unified inpainting model, eliminating model training and achieving superior performance and stability.
